body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Ross Motors customer support. My name is Ronald Ross. May I have your name, please?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hi, my name is Deborah Wilson.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Deborah. Could you please provide me with your phone number?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, it's three one zero five five five eight eight eight eight.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And could you also share your email address with me?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for providing that information, Deborah. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, I think that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for contacting us, Deborah. We appreciate your time. Have a great day!
